courseDescription:
Cloud computing is a leading solution for almost any company worldwide. A growing number of business companies have decided to use cloud services as part of their digital transformation, while aiming to be more innovative and flexible in regards to the dynamic business landscape by leveraging the power of the cloud.

Cloud computing includes a variety of cloud service models, like SaaS, IaaS, PaaS, and FaaS. Each one of them is a complete category of cloud services that is used to solve a variety of business challenges. Initially, we will learn the key terms in cloud computing and then zoom in and focus on the IaaS model. The course also explores the building blocks, typical use cases, pros and cons, pricing models, and much more in relation to cloud computing.

Lastly it moves onto the IaaS model, which is provided by large cloud providers that are helping companies transform their private IT infrastructure into a flexible, scalable utility service. It also reduces the footprint of enterprise applications sitting in costly private data centers and leverages the capabilities in a worldwide public cloud environment. Enroll now to start learning about cloud computing and the IaaS model with no registration or subscription fees.
